mapper.select: SELECT user_number AS userNumber, id, password, name, email, phone, birthday, gender, status, role, grade FROM users WHERE id = #{id} AND password = #{pw} AND status = 'ACTIVE'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( user_number, id, password, name, email, phone, birthday, gender, role, status, grade, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( SEQ_USERS.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{role}, #{status}, #{grade}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET password = #{pw}, updated_at = SYSDATE WHERE id = #{id}
